snippet.title: THE SHORE - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
📌 Check out the Teaser Trailer of Survival Horror Game - based on Lovecraftian mythology with the title - The Shore.

THE SHORE is a game that focused on the mystery of the unknown with horror elements on a forbidden island, the whole story is based on a mythology that goes deep through the core of the Lovecraft's creations and far more. From the player's perspective, you will experience an atmospheric gameplay environment.

🎮 Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1297300/The_Shore
🌐 Website: https://www.theshoregame.com​
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/theshoregame​
🌐 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheShoreGame​
📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theshoregame​
👾 Discord Server: https://discord.gg/gCCWYFWrKx​
💼 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-shore-game
🤖 SubReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/theshoregame​
📧 Contact: info@theshoregame.com

Soundtrack  by  Thanos Zampoukas
#TheShore #TheShoreGame
